plot outline: Dr. Neelkanth and his wife Arundhati are living in his native village since the last 5 years. Their son Bundoo, is studying in a boarding school in Pune. Having born in a rich family, money was never an issue. After successfully practicing for 2 years in Mumbai, Dr.Neelkanth decided to go to the village for the better of the rural people, much to the annoyance of his wife. One day he gets a visit from one Shekhar Mirajkar, a sales executive from a tractor firm. A bewildered Arundhati is shocked to see Shekhar, her ex lover.
title: Soor Rahu De
plot: A high voltage emotional drama with a social message, embellished with fine performances.

Dr. Neelkanth and his wife Arundhati are living in his native village since the last 5 years. Their son Bundoo, is studying in a boarding school in Pune. Having born in a rich family, money was never an issue. After successfully practicing for 2 years in Mumbai, Dr.Neelkanth decided to go to the village for the better of the rural people, much to the annoyance of his wife. One day he gets a visit from one Shekhar Mirajkar, a sales executive from a tractor firm. A bewildered Arundhati is shocked to see Shekhar, her ex lover.::Everest Entertainment
